Tumblr has approved a bunch of new themes for The Garden over the weekend, with them was my latest theme, Day Dream. Designed to have wider appeal than my first, dark, monospaced font only theme, I’m hoping this one will be a bit more popular.

Sidenote: The theme garden is quite full now and the current structure isn’t scaling well. I’m sure Tumblr is working on it but even permalinks in the form of in page anchors on the recent page would be nice in the mean time.
